fixes.name: Change Initial Cash USD (T-X)
fixes.dax_expression: 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] - 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X]
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the row-level subtraction to DAX by referencing the two calculated fields on the same table. The expression directly subtracts 'Initial Cash USD X' from 'Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)'.
fixes.type_changed_reason: Although the top-level formula is a simple row-level subtraction, the dependent calculated fields reference Tableau parameters. Per the rules, any calculation that references parameters must be created as a measure.
